Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3997 affecting package systemd for versions less than 250.3-21
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-3997 affecting package systemd for versions less than 250.3-21. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package systemd is earlier than 250.3-21, affected by CVE-2021-3997
